children.text:
I agree with Sample Interviewer and HireVue, Inc to participate in a video job interview conducted by HireVue for the purpose of a possible employment at Sample Interviewer. I acknowledge that the interview may be recorded and consent to such recording. 

I hereby grant, transfer to Sample Interviewer and HireVue all rights, title, and interest in content resulting from the digital interview, including video, in accordance with employment data privacy regulations and each company's data privacy policies. I hereby waive my right to make any claim or demand or bringing any causes of action against Sample Interviewer and HireVue and I hereby release and discharge Sample Interviewer and HireVue, from all claims, causes of action, or demands rising out of or in connection with the use of the video job interview for the purposes of employment screening. I acknowledge that HireVue may provide rating tools to Sample Interviewer in conjunction with their digital interview platform, but that all evaluation criteria and hiring decisions are at the sole discretion of Sample Interviewer and I shall not hold HireVue liable for any such criteria or decisions. 

I attest that I have voluntarily agreed to be interviewed and that this document contains the entire and complete agreement concerning the use and preservation of my interview. 

Important: If you do not agree, exit the interview and contact your recruitment representative.
